backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Internet Computer actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a high-confidence UI feature adding a gentle fade-in animation to the romantic hero image, including affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Meta file containing human-written summaries of key frontend source files and their responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining global design tokens, themes (light, dark, romantic, playful), and color variables using OKLCH.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting the Valentine-themed page title and mounting the React app to the root element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application rendering the Valentine interaction flow with Yes/No logic, romantic theming, animated hero image, and a celebration state.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationEffec: Overlay component that renders animated floating hearts and confetti with randomized positions, timing, and colors.
frontend/src/components/PersonalizationP: Empty component file reserved for a future personalization UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication, using React Query for caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
Empty placeholder for a custom hook intended to sync React state with localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty module noting that no backend queries are required for this frontend-only experience.
frontend/src/lib/personalizationDefaults: Empty placeholder file intended to define default personalization settings and related types.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application bootstrap that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, global styles, and renders the App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling class-based dark mode, scanning frontend sources, and extending the theme with CSS-variable-driven colors, fonts, radii, shadows, and custom animations (accordion, float, bounce, celebration). It integrates typography, container queries, and animation plugins and defines a centered container layout.
project_state.json: Project metadata snapshot describing an ICP starter app with a placeholder Motoko backend and a React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui Valentine-themed frontend. It enumerates existing features, versions, and a narrative summary of the playful Yes/No interaction, authentication context, and celebration effects.
